WOOHOOO discover & admire

NINA

the driver
Nickname: Nina, Blondie, Racing Soul
Born: 19.01.1995
Passions: Cars, Horse-riding, Martial arts, Snowboarding, Archery, Meditation
Fav-car: My car!
Fav-movie: Star Wars, LoTR, Iron Man

Motto: See that the whole existence is celebrating. The trees are not serious, the birds are not serious. The rivers and the oceans are wild, and everywhere there is fun, everywhere there is joy and delight. Watch existence, listen to the existence and become part of it.” - OSHO

VERONIKA

the fashionist
Nickname: Veronika
Born: 30.10.1996
Passions: Singing, Dance, Fashion, Fitness, Volleyball
Fav-car: Aston Martin Vanquish, Mercedes-Benz G
Fav-movie: The Intouchables, Forrest Gump

I am a student, who successfully finished high school this year. Fashion is one of my passions, therefore I want to create Woohooo fashion, which would describe life style of young girls, who want to show, that every day can be lived in joy, not only stereotypically.

ANITA

the motivator
Nickname: Anita
Born: 12.03.1993
Passions: Singing, Dancing, Yachting
Fav-car: Hummer
Fav-movie: Peaceful Warrior

I love challenges, adventure and new discoveries. I love contact with people and getting to know new, unknown territories both in terms of personality, activities and places.

I would like to work with people who want to live in harmony with one another, discover their potential and their capabilities and also with children. I’m constantly looking for a life that will be more conscious, joyful and full of unconditional love.

SILVIA

the presenter
Nickname: Silvia
Born: 27.07.1992
Passions: Music, Horses, Cameras, Adventures
Fav-car: Lamborghini
Fav-movie: Green Mile, What happened in Vegas

I am a joyful woman, loving traveling, searching for adventure and new experiences. I dont know what is a boredom, trying to make the best of everything, dancing like nobody is watching!

In Woohooo, I'm the presenter, I'm in charge of videos and I'm bringing my neverending energy, artistic skills, craziness and fun!

WHO ARE WE?

We are a team of four girls, who create a perfect team. We aren't afraid of living life to the fullest. We live for the great experiences with the people we love. We believe that the beauty in life is in passion and authenticity. We live in the present, living our dreams. Each one of us has some unique talent and individuality, and together with our Woohooo driver we want to show everyone a new way of life, to go as an example to all the young fellows out there. We seek unique experiences which will fulfill and enrich us.

We rarely found ourselves in a bar or a cafe. You will find us rafting the lakes, yachting, racing on go-karts, race tracks, having a picknick somewhere in the forest - always on our journey seeking new adventures. We fight against virtual reality, spending countless hours with phones or tablets in their hands, gossiping and trashtalking, fake superiority or women who can't even cook. We want to show what really women are made of, because most of them don't even know their true feminine power!
